adrFormatAddress: 260 West End Ave, New York, NY 10023-3614, USA

originalText.text: My son has been taking piano lessons for six years and is at advanced level. He has recently started to study with Vera and has made tremendous improvements. I am with him in every lesson, and am impressed to see how music ideas from great masters can be explained, analyzed, and conveyed with such richness and fullness to my 12-year-old, so that he can also understand, and therefore, appreciate, and feel the music. Her classes are inspiring, and there’s nothing more rewarding than hearing those inspirations from under my son’s hands.

text.text: My son has been taking piano lessons for six years and is at advanced level. He has recently started to study with Vera and has made tremendous improvements. I am with him in every lesson, and am impressed to see how music ideas from great masters can be explained, analyzed, and conveyed with such richness and fullness to my 12-year-old, so that he can also understand, and therefore, appreciate, and feel the music. Her classes are inspiring, and there’s nothing more rewarding than hearing those inspirations from under my son’s hands.

originalText.text: My son embarked on his remarkable piano journey with Ms. Vera at the age of 6, and over the past five years, the progress he has made under her dedicated guidance is truly impressive. Ms.Vera’s engaging style has not only made his piano lessons something he eagerly anticipates but also significantly enhanced his focus and discipline. Thanks to Ms.Vera’s dedication, he has grown comfortable performing in front of audiences, be it recitals or friends or family. In essence, Ms.Vera’s persistent efforts in molding my son into a proficient musician and a confident performer have been nothing short of transformative. Thank you, Vera, for unlocking the beauty of music for my son.

originalText.text: Ms. Vera is an expert piano teacher; she brings to her lessons a vast knowledge of music theory and history. Additionally. Ms. Vera works very closely with students to ensure that they are independent in terms of understanding notes and dynamics. We recently moved to New York and are very happy that we found Ms. Vera. My son is excelling in her lessons.

originalText.text: Vera is a fantastic teacher! She is mega professional, very experienced and easy to get along with kids. There is no drama or unmet expectations with her. Vera is very wise and kind. My daughter has been making a huge progress and is in love with her!

text.text: Vera is a fantastic teacher! She is mega professional, very experienced and easy to get along with kids. There is no drama or unmet expectations with her. Vera is very wise and kind. My daughter has been making a huge progress and is in love with her!

originalText.text: Vera is a wonderful teacher! She taught both of my children 7 and 12, and they dramatically improved during the time she was teaching them. Vera is great at inspiring children to try to play more complex pieces.
